name: mondrian pullover
notes:
**ps: ⭐️ i'm a season 8 knit star! ⭐️ shop this season's masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 [here][1].**

a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here.][2] 

inspired by the modernist abstract grid-based art of piet mondrian, this slouchy pullover is elevated by dramatic off-set color blocking. oversized drop sleeves and a relaxed fit add a softness to the otherwise sharp lines.

shop the yarn [here.][3] 

**sizes**
xs (s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl, 4xl)
suggested positive ease: 12-16”/30.5-40.5cm
pictured in a size s on model with 34”/86cm bust

**finished dimensions**
bust circumference: 42.25 (46.5, 50.75, 53.75, 58.25, 62.5, 66.75, 71.25)”/107.5 (118, 129, 136.5, 148, 159, 169.5, 181) cm
length: 19.5 (20, 20.5, 21, 21.5, 22, 22.5, 23)”/49.5 (51, 52,53.5, 54.5, 56, 57, 58.5)cm
sleeve length: 19”/48cm

**difficulty level**
beginner

**skills**
knitting and purling
ssk and k2tog decreases
intarsia color changes
working flat
working in the round
